item.title: A day on Hadrian's Wall
item.description: Photo: Sycamore Gap Greenhead I told everyone who asked that I slept well. It wasn’t really true; the room was well-heated and there’s nothing but a comforter, reinforcing the fact that I sleep best in the cold. On the flip side, it’s impossible to complain because thanks to the over-powered heaters, every scrap of clothing and shoe I have is completely dry. No rain is forecast for today, my third walking Hadrian’s Wall Path.
